name: v2022.10.00
body:
## What's Changed
* Merge main in to latest by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/919
* Upgrade to Compose 1.3 by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/918
* Update compose-latest | Compose 1.3.0-alpha03 | Compiler 1.3.0 | Kotlin 1.7.10 by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/925
* [Crane] Fix destinations not in list issue. by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/938
* [compose-latest Crane] Bugfix for destinations not found in Crane by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/939
* Update plugin com.android.test to v7.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/931
* Update Androidx Lifecycle deps to v2.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/932
* Fix a11y bugs of Jetcaster by @EasyVector in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/914
* Fix readme image size by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/926
* [Jetcaster] Fix recomposition loop in verticalGradientScrim by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/946
* Fixing: Remove Unused If-Else condition by @sparrow007 in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/884
* Version Catalog support  by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/950
* Disable auto creation of deps PRs for renovate by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/960
* Compose latest by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/961
* [Jetnews] Update to Material3 by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/964
* [JetNews] Remove invalid comment by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/966
* Main into Compose-latest by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/965
* [compose-latest] Update samples on compose-latest branch to Compose 1.3.0-beta01 by @simona-anomis in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/967
* [Jetsurvey] Converted to use Material 3 by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/954
* Updating to safe flow collection with collectAsStateWithLifecycle() by @astamato in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/970
* [Jetsurvey] Converted to use Material 3 (#954) by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/971
* Update to Compose 1.3.0-beta02 by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/974
* [All] Updated to Compose 1.3.0-beta03, AGP 7.3.0 by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/979
* Update plugin com.github.ben-manes.versions to v0.42.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/959
* Add matrix level and sample name to output folder. by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/982
* main > compose-latest by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/984
* Fix updateDeps.sh in README by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/987
* Fix formatting not running on samples by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/981
* Ben/merge main into latest by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/988
* [All] Add a method to easily test a snapshot locally and on CI by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/990
* Merge main into latest by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/991
* [All] Update to 1.3.0-rc01 by @astamato in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/983
* Update readme with formatting instructions by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/992
* Fix snapshot script not working on unix runners by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/994
* Updating Material3 to RC01 by @florina-muntenescu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/993
* [All] Update to collectAsStateWithLifecycle to latest alpha by @astamato in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/995
* [Jetsurvey] Removed Slider workaround for M3 bug by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/998
* Reply material updates and dual pane support by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/989
* [All] Upgrade AGP to 7.3.0 by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/999
* Merge main into compose-latest by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/1002
* Adding JetLagged Sample by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/1004
* Adding Build file for JetLagged by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/1006
* Update Compose version by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/1003
* [Quick View] Merging compose-latest to main by @astamato in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/985
* Switch to BOM for JetLagged by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/1009

## New Contributors
* @EasyVector made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/914
* @sparrow007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/884

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.2.1...v2022.10.00

name: v1.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Compose navigation in reply by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/828
* Reply Detail screen navigation. by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/839
* Reply: Add Navigation content positioning to Nav rail and drawer for Long Tablets/Tablets in Portrait modes by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/854
* Update README to include high level features by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/858
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/856
* Update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/866
* Update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/867
* Update dependency androidx.compose.material3:material3-window-size-class to v1.0.0-alpha14 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/864
* Update actions/upload-artifact action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/869
* Update plugin com.android.test to v7.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/872
* [JetNews] Use derived state of for scrolled state to avoid recomposition on scrolling by @oas004 in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/881
* [Crane] Fix animation on backdrop sheet by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/887
* [JetSurvey] Improve sign up process by @tsuharesu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/851
* [Jetchat] Renamed JetchatScaffold to JetchatDrawer by @sumanabhi in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/891
* [Jetchat] Unnecessary spread operator by @rlatapy-luna in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/894
* [Jetnews] Be more explicit about robolectric version by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/897
* Reply adaptive sample ready for integration to compose samples. by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/882
* [Reply] Fix: Removed deprecated windowInsetController with WindowCompat. by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/902
* Added Reply to bug and feature template for github by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/903
* [All] Updating to Compose 1.2 by @florina-muntenescu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/905
* [Reply]: Added material 3 shapes and fix permanent drawer back button. by @Gurupreet in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/923
* Renovate: Group renovate and compose dependencies by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/895
* Update accompanist_version to v0.25.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/928
* Update main | Compose 1.2.1 | Compiler 1.3.0 | Kotlin 1.7.10 by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/924

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/856
* @oas004 made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/881
* @sumanabhi made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/891
* @rlatapy-luna made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/894

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.2.0-rc03...v1.2.1

name: v1.2.0-rc03

name: v1.2.0-rc02
body:
## What's Changed
* Add support for workflow_dispatch on all GH workflows. by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/852
* [Crane] Use AnimatedContent to transition between content states. by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/843
* [JetSurvey] Use AnimatedContent to slide in and out changes between questions by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/842
* [All] Update to Compose 1.2.0-rc02 by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/853


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.2.0-rc01...v1.2.0-rc02

name: v1.2.0-rc01
body:
[All] Update to Compose v1.2.0-rc01 (#840)

* Compose 1.2.0-beta01 -> 1.2.0-beta01
* AGP 7.2.0 -> 7.2.1
* Spotless 6.5.2 -> 6.7.0
* Accompanist 0.24.8-beta -> 0.24.11-rc

name: v1.2.0-beta03
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Coil to 2.0.0. by @colinrtwhite in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/801
* [Crane] Paddings in landscape mode by @VladDaniliuk in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/803
* [JetNews] Kotlin and Gradle version update + extra SwipeToRefresh by @LinX64 in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/715
* Fix Crane Dagger lint by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/806
* [Jetsurvey] Updated date handling to use UTC only by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/810
* [All samples] Add Spotless & ktlint to the update version script by @simona-anomis in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/809
* [Jetnews] Add multipreview annotations feature by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/808
* Applied spotless fixes by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/813
* [All Samples] Add NiA to additional samples by @tunjid in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/807
* Add name of workflow as prefix to fix issues with cancelling other jobs by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/814
* [All] Update samples to Compose 1.2.0-beta02 by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/815
* Create reusable workflow build-sample.yml. by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/818
* [Skip-CI] Add accompanist to the upgrade script by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/816
* Reuse build workflow by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/819
* Update Stackflow tag to android-jetpack-compose by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/822
* [Jetcaster] Fix Readme out-of-date by @jisungbin in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/821
* [All] Change reference of Android Studio to Chipmunk by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/820
* Revert "Reuse build workflow" by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/824
* [Jetsnack] Remove baseline profiles from stable branch by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/826
* Downgrade to AGP stable for main branch by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/827
* Clean up Owl and add Lazy item keys & animateItemPlacement animation by @simona-anomis in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/829
* Remove runs-on and timeout-minutes config from JetNews.yml by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/832
* [All] Update to Compose 1.2.0-beta03 by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/833

## New Contributors
* @VladDaniliuk made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/803
* @LinX64 made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/715
* @tunjid made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/807
* @jisungbin made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/821

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.2.0-beta01...v1.2.0-beta03

name: v1.2.0-beta01
body:
## What's Changed
* [Jetsurvey]: Prevent email text field from going off screen. by @arriolac in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/779
* Adding CODEOWNERS file for PR reviews by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/788
* Create blunderbuss.yml config to assign issues to compose devrel by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/790
* [Jetchat] Fix insets by disabling consumption by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/786
* [JetChat] Adding Downloadable Fonts implementation by @astamato in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/787
* [Crane] Ignore benchmark test for CI by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/791
* [Crane] Incorrect shape of backdrop Scaffold by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/793
* Create stale.yml by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/792
* Update CODEOWNERS by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/795
* [JetNews] Add gif of JetNews working on large screens by @tsuharesu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/789
* [Jetchat] Update to Compose Material 3 1.0.0-alpha10 and fix icon buttons by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/798
* Updated README to remove mention of Artic Fox by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/797
* Maintenance: Cancel in progress builds when new changes are triggered by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/796
* [Jetnews] Replace custom WindowSizeClasses with material3-window-size-class by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/729
* [All] Update to Compose 1.2.0-beta01 by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/799

## New Contributors
* @astamato made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/787
* @tsuharesu made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/789

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.2.0-alpha08...v1.2.0-beta01

name: v1.2.0-alpha06

## What's Changed
* [JetSnack] Add a baseline profile to improve startup performance by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/748
* Add layout for Book posture and supports dual-screen devices. by @pfmaggi in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/751
* [All] Update to Compose 1.2.0-alpha05 by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/752

* [All] Update to Compose 1.2.0-alpha06 by @IanGClifton in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/760
* [Crane] Change back arrow to be onSurface color 🔙 by @riggaroo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/762
* Update BottomBar height within Article Screen by @ed-george in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/764

## New Contributors

* @riggaroo made their first contribution in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/761

name: v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* [All] Version bumps (Compose 1.0.4, Kotlin 1.5.31, Accompanist 0.20.0) by @JoseAlcerreca in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/683
* Remove PreviewParameterProvider from src/debug by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/685
* Fixes navigation drawer issue by @JoseAlcerreca in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/689
* Keyboard support for search field by @fuentespatrick in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/687
* [All] Update to Compose 1.1.0-beta01 by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/684
* [Jetchat] Update to Material 3 by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/690
* [Material Catalog] Update README assets by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/691
* Update Jetchat README GIFs by @ricknout in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/693

* [All] Update to Compose 1.1.0-beta03 by @simona-anomis in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/704

* [Jetchat] Using m3 alpha02 and NavigationDrawer by @florina-muntenescu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/718
* Updating all samples to Compose 1.1.0-rc01 and Kotlin 1.6.10 by @florina-muntenescu in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/716
* [Owl] Improve tests by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/722
* [All] Update Compose to 1.1.0-rc03 by @bentrengrove in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/730
* [All] Update tooling dependencies by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/737

name: v1.0.4
body:
## What's Changed
* [Jetnews] Snackbars large screens support by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/631
* [Jetnews] Add WindowSize breakpoints by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/632
* [Jetnews] Add NavRail for large screens by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/636
* [JetNews] List-detail support for main page by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/629
* [Jetnews] Interests screen LS support by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/639
* [Jetnews] Large screen support for the Interests tab by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/641
* [JetNews] Fix state saving with drawer by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/653
* [JetNews] Convert navrail/drawer decision to use currentWindowMetrics by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/654
* [Jetnews] Better TopAppBar in large screens by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/650
* [Jetnews] Move NavRail to top level component by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/655
* [JetNews] Update window size breakpoints by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/658
* [JetNews] Adjust medium behavior by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/657
* [JetNews] Replace currentWindowMetrics flow with synchronous calculation by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/660
* [Jetnews] Consolidate compact and medium layouts by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/659
* [Jetnews] Add space between NavRail icons by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/663
* [Jetnews] Custom interests layout by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/665
* [Crane] Use createEmptyComposeRule for test with injection by @JolandaVerhoef in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/668
* [JetNews] Move window size calculation to activity level by @alexvanyo in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/667
* [Jetsnack] Refactor JetsnackApp state holder by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/669
* Merge main into ls by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/672
* [Jetcaster] Add navigation by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/673
* [Jetcaster] Add player screen by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/674
* Merge main into ls by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/675
* [Jetcaster] Add tabletop posture support to the Player screen by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/676
* Adapt Jetnews to large screens and Jetcaster to tabletop posture by @manuelvicnt in https://github.com/android/compose-samples/pull/678


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/android/compose-samples/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

name: JetNews updated to dev08
body:
Changes:
 * Refactored modifiers to use fluent style throughout
 * Switched to new use Icon and Image composables
 * Switch to using IconButton where appropriate
 * Updated Scaffolding to use IconButton for navigationIcon
 * Removed vector helpers from sample that are now included in the library
 * Update typography of code paragraphs to expand, and avoid setting background
    on text in code blocks as alpha is not respected – use the background of the    Box
 * Replaced all Container with Box
 * General code cleanup to remove nesting that can be replaced with modifiers
 * Moved Modifiers to *first default argument* to follow style
 * Aligned bullets with baseline of text
 * Sized bullets based on font scaling
 * Removed many named arguments that were not required for readability
* Added note for bugfix related to font coloring requiring contentColor w/ link to b/143626708
 * Use ColorFilter.tint to semantically tint vectors
 * Continue using `Modifier.None` for default arguments which is the style in dev08, this is likely to be replaced with `Modifier` in dev09

name: JetNews updated to dev06
body:
Changes:
- Removed deprecated calls to Draw
- Configured Kotlin compiler
- Added some missing @Composable annotations (caught by new compiler)
- Update to use ImagePainter and cleanup modifier usage for images.
- Switch to contentColor for unselected topic buttons

name: JetNews updated to dev05
body:
Changes:
- Bumped version
- Convert screens to use new Scaffold component
- Use modifiers for PostCardPopular instead of Space for margin
- Add @Preview throughout for various states and components
- Fixed all warnings
- Updated to new Ambient syntax
